amendment.description: To establish requirements with respect to the terms of consumer credit extended by a creditor to a servicemember or the dependent of a servicemember, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4331 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4331 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6352-6353) To establish requirements with respect to the terms of consumer credit extended by a creditor to a servicemember or the dependent of a servicemember, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4331 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4331 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Talent.
